attributes.action: Ban the advertised sale of any dogs with "docked tails"
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Despite the law banning docked tails, dogs are still be advertised for sale with docked tails.  There is no need for tail docking.  This is a cosmetic practice.  And owners get around this by saying they will be working dogs yet when advertising them for sale they do not know this. Stop this horrible practive
